caption.p: Atom % 13C ( a, b) and % 15N enrichment ( c, d) of Orbicella faveolata (right) and their Symbiodinium (left) after a 10 h pulse of 15NO 3 − and H 13CO 3 − following a 10-day incubation at ambient (26 °C) and elevated (31 °C) temperature. Points represent the mean +/− standard error of 10 replicate samples collected from the shallow (1 m; dominated by ITS2 phylotype A3) and deep (15 m; dominated by ITS2 phylotype C7) fore-reef at Carrie Bow Cay, Belize. Initial samples reflect the natural abundance isotope composition prior to tracer incubation. * indicates a significant difference between the temperature treatments within a depth fraction. ‡ indicates a significant difference between shallow and deep samples
